title: Saratoga National Historical Park: Service Animals
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility     Service Animals              Service Animals       Service animals must be leashed / harnessed at all times.  They are allowed in all park facilities and on all park trails unless closed by order of the superintendent.  However, Tour Road Stop 10 walking trail is very steep, and Saratoga Monument can only be climbed by means of steep iron stairs; those areas should be avoided. "Service animal" is defined / explained on the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) website.
